Benefit.p: You can make an accelerate, decelerate, or turn action as a move action instead of a standard action. Furthermore, when stopping a vehicle, you subtract 10 feet from the roll to determine how many feet the vehicle moves forward before it stops.

Bundle.title: Expert Explorer
Bundle.description: You are trained to seek out the unknown places of the wild and can explore more efficiently than your untrained rivals.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Knowledge (nature) or Survival 5 ranks.

Benefit.p: You gain a +2 bonus on skill checks when using the exploration rules to detect features in a territory. If you succeed at such a skill check by 5 or more, you gain an additional 1d4 Discovery Points.

Bundle.title: Expert Salvager
Bundle.description: You are adept at foraging and salvaging raw materials from even the most seemingly sparse of environments.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Craft (any) 2 ranks, Spellcraft 2 ranks.

Benefit.p: You gain a +4 bonus on Craft checks for Craft skills in which you have at least 2 ranks and Spellcraft checks when crafting items by foraging alchemical supplies and material components, salvaging raw crafting materials, and salvaging raw magical item materials.

Bundle.title: Expert Sniper
Bundle.description: Your quick ranged attacks make you difficult to locate.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Stealth 3 ranks.

Benefit.p: You reduce the penalty on your Stealth checks to stay hidden while sniping by 10.

Normal.p: You take a -20 penalty on Stealth checks to stay hidden while sniping.

Bundle.title: Exploit Lore
Bundle.description: You can use your knowledge of a creature's weaknesses to deliver a driving and relentless assault against it.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Monster lore class feature, base attack bonus +11.

Benefit.p: Once per day, when you successfully identify all abilities and weaknesses of a creature using the appropriate Knowledge check, you gain a +2 bonus on attack and damage rolls against that creature for 1 minute. If you identify the abilities and weaknesses of numerous creatures, you must pick one creature to be the target of this effect.

Bundle.title: Explosive Escape
Bundle.description: When you break a grapple, you can send your assailants flying away from you.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Dex 13, Str 13, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike.

Benefit.p: When you succeed at a combat maneuver check to break a grapple, you can choose to throw back any enemies participating in the grapple who are up to one size category larger than you. Such foes are thrown 5 feet directly away from you and take an amount of nonlethal damage equal to that of your unarmed attack.

Bundle.title: Explosive Weapon
Bundle.description: You can channel magical power through your weapon to devastating effect.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Arcing Weapon, diverse training class feature.

Benefit.p: As a standard action, you can cast a spell with an area of effect and a duration of instantaneous, such as fireball, and release it through your melee weapon as part of a melee attack. This functions as the magus spellstrike ability, except the spell damage does not multiply on a critical hit, the spell effect is centered on you, and you are excluded from its effects.

Bundle.title: Exquisite Sneak
Bundle.description: You know how to move silently even while wearing some forms of armor.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Dex 15, Careful Sneak, Stealth 6 ranks.

Benefit.p: You do not apply the armor check penalty for light and medium armor on Stealth skill checks no matter how fast you move. You still cannot use Stealth while running or charging.

Bundle.title: Exsanguinate
Bundle.description: You drink blood from the living at a furious rate, often draining creatures dry in a matter of seconds.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Blood drain universal monster ability, grab universal monster ability.

Benefit.p: Once per round, when you successfully pin an opponent, that opponent takes double the normal damage from your blood drain.

Bundle.title: Extend Resonant Power
Bundle.description: You can share the benefits of your resonant focus powers with nearby allies.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Caster level 7th, mental focus class feature.

Benefit.p: Select an implement school. When you place mental focus points into an implement of that school, You can choose to gain benefits from the resonant power as if you had placed only half as many points of mental focus into the implement. If you do, you can extend the same benefits to one additional ally within 30 feet at the time you invest mental focus. If the ally moves outside of the extended power's range, the power is suppressed, but it resumes functioning once the ally moves within range again. You can spend 1 point of mental focus from your implement to pass the effect to a new target, so long as both the original target and the new one are within 30 feet. This feat can affect only one implement from a given school at a time, even if you have selected the same implement school more than once.

Special.p: You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you take the feat, select a different implement school.

Bundle.title: Extend Spell
Bundle.description: You can make your spells last twice as long.

Benefit.p: An extended spell lasts twice as long as normal. A spell with a duration of concentration, instantaneous, or permanent is not affected by this feat.
Level Increase: +1 (an extended spell uses up a spell slot one level higher than the spell's actual level.)

Bundle.title: Extend The Bulwark
Bundle.description: You can bolster a trained ally's defenses by interposing your own armored body.

Benefit.p: If you are wearing medium or heavy armor and are adjacent to an ally who also has this feat, as a free action, you may give your ally a circumstance bonus to her AC equal to half the armor bonus provided by your armor. This bonus lasts for 1 round. During this round, you gain no bonus to your AC from your armor.

Bundle.title: Extended Animal Focus
Bundle.description: You can assume the aspects of an animal for longer stretches of time than most of your rivals and allies.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Animal focus class feature.

Benefit.p: Add your Wisdom bonus (minimum 1) to the number of minutes per day that you can use your animal focus ability to assume the aspects of an animal.

Bundle.title: Extended Aspects
Bundle.description: You can invoke your aspect's minor form longer than most.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Shifter aspect class feature.

Benefit.p: Add your Wisdom bonus (minimum 1) to the number of minutes per day that you can use your shifter aspect ability to assume a minor form.

Bundle.title: Extended Bane
Bundle.description: Your dedication knows no limit. Your wrath dies hard.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Bane class feature.

Benefit.p: Add your Wisdom bonus to the number of rounds per day that you can use your bane ability.

Bundle.title: Extended Combat Meditation
Bundle.description: You are able to glean insight from your momentary meditation for longer than most can.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Wis 13, Combat Meditation, Meditation Master, character level 9th.

Benefit.p: Add your Wisdom bonus (if any) to the number of rounds that you gain the benefits of your meditation feats when using Combat Meditation.

Bundle.title: Extended Scrying
Bundle.description: Your scrying spells last longer.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Ability to cast a spell of the scrying subschool.

Benefit.p: Any scrying spell you cast lasts twice as long as normal, as if it were cast as an extended spell with the Extend Spell metamagic feat. Additionally, when you cast a scrying spell with a casting time of 10 minutes or longer, that casting time is halved.

Bundle.title: Extended Stare
Bundle.description: Your hypnotic stare has greater reach than normal.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Hypnotic stare class feature.

Benefit.p: The range of your hypnotic stare increases by 10 feet.

Special.p: You can take this feat multiple times. Its effects stack.

Bundle.title: Extra Amplification
Bundle.description: You are a master at manipulating your mental energies to produce amplified effects.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Phrenic amplification class feature.

Benefit.p: You gain one additional phrenic amplification. This can't be a major amplification.

Special.p: You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, you gain another phrenic amplification.

Bundle.title: Extra Arcana
Bundle.description: You have unlocked the secret of a new magus arcana.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Magus arcana class feature.

Benefit.p: You gain one additional magus arcana. You must meet all the prerequisites for this magus arcana.

Special.p: You can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects stack, granting a new arcana each time you gain this feat.

Bundle.title: Extra Arcane Pool
Bundle.description: You have learned how to draw more power from your arcane pool.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Arcane pool class feature.

Benefit.p: Your arcane pool increases by 2.

Special.p: You can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects stack, granting you an increase to your arcane pool each time you take this feat.

Bundle.title: Extra Arcanist Exploit
Bundle.description: Your repertoire of arcanist exploits expands.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Arcanist exploit class feature.

Benefit.p: You gain one additional arcanist exploit. You must meet the prerequisites for this arcanist exploit.

Special.p: You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, you gain another arcanist exploit.

Bundle.title: Extra Bane
Bundle.description: You can use your bane ability more often than normal.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Bane class feature.

Benefit.p: You can use your bane ability for 3 additional rounds per day.

Bundle.title: Extra Bombs
Bundle.description: You can throw more bombs per day.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Bomb class feature.

Benefit.p: You can throw two additional bombs per day.

Special.p: You can gain Extra Bombs multiple times. Its effects stack.

Bundle.title: Extra Cantrips or Orisons
Bundle.description: You are a master of minor spells.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Ability to cast cantrips or orisons.

Benefit.p: Add two cantrips to your cantrips known or two orisons to your orisons known.

Special.p: You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, add two cantrips or orisons to your spells known.

Bundle.title: Extra Channel
Bundle.description: You can channel divine energy more often.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Channel energy class feature.

Benefit.p: You can channel energy two additional times per day.

Special.p: If a paladin with the ability to channel positive energy takes this feat, she can use lay on hands four additional times a day, but only to channel positive energy.

Bundle.title: Extra Contingency
Bundle.description: You can manage multiple contingency effects.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Character level 19th.

Benefit.p: You can have two contingency effects active at one time. If they would both trigger on the same round, one (chosen randomly) does not trigger until 1 round later.

Normal.p: You can benefit from only a single contingency active at a time.

Bundle.title: Extra Discovery
Bundle.description: You have made a new alchemical discovery.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Discovery class feature.

Benefit.p: You gain one additional discovery. You must meet all of the prerequisites for this discovery.

Special.p: You can gain Extra Discovery multiple times.

Bundle.title: Extra Elemental Assault
Bundle.Prerequisites: Suli.

Benefit.p: Your elemental assault ability lasts an additional 2 rounds per day.

Special.p: You can take this feat multiple times. Its effects stack.

Bundle.title: Extra Evolution
Bundle.description: Your eidolon has more evolutions.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Eidolon class feature.

Benefit.p: Your eidolon's evolution pool increases by 1.

Special.p: This evolution* can be taken once at 1st level, and again at 5th, 10th, 15th, and 20th.
Editor Note: This feat can be taken at the listed intervals.

Bundle.title: Extra Focus Power
Bundle.description: You gain an additional focus power from your implements.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Focus power class feature.

Benefit.p: You gain one additional focus power from among those available from your chosen implement schools. You must select a power for which you normally qualify.

Special.p: You can choose this feat once for every implement school you know, up to a maximum of seven times at 18th level. Each time you do, you must choose a different focus power. If you have selected the same implement school more than once, you can select a focus power from that school once for each time you selected that school.

Bundle.title: Extra Gnome Magic
Bundle.description: The raw magic that flows through your gnome blood is stronger than normal.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Cha 13, gnome.

Benefit.p: You gain an additional three uses per day of your gnome spell-like abilities (dancing lights, ghost sound, prestidigitation). You can use these in any combination; for example, you can use dancing lights four times in one day (taking all three additional uses for the same spell), or you can cast ghost sound twice, prestidigitation twice, speak with animals twice, and dancing lights once. If you have a feat, trait, or other ability that changes your racial 0-level spell-like abilities to other 0-level spells, this feat applies to them instead.

Bundle.title: Extra Grit
Bundle.description: You have more grit than the ordinary gunslinger.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Grit class feature or the Amateur Gunslinger feat.

Benefit.p: You gain 2 extra grit points at the start of each day, and your maximum grit increases by 2.

Normal.p: If you are a gunslinger, you gain your Wisdom modifier in grit points at the start of each day, which is also your maximum grit. If you have the Amateur Gunslinger feat, you gain 1 grit point at the start of each day, and your maximum grit is equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Special.p: If you possess levels in the gunslinger class, you can take this feat multiple times.

Bundle.title: Extra Hail of Arrows
Bundle.description: You are a master at raining arrows upon your foes.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Hail of arrows class feature.

Benefit.p: You can use your hail of arrows ability one additional time per day.

Special.p: You can select this feat multiple times. Each time you take the feat, you can use this ability one additional time per day.

Bundle.title: Extra Hex
Bundle.description: You have learned the secrets of a new hex.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Hex class feature.

Benefit.p: You gain one additional hex. You must meet the prerequisites for this hex. If you are a shaman, it must be a hex granted by your spirit rather than one from a wandering spirit.

Special.p: You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, you gain another hex.

Bundle.title: Extra Inspiration
Bundle.description: You are more able to draw upon inspiration than most.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Amateur Investigator or inspiration class feature.

Benefit.p: You gain three extra use per day of inspiration in your inspiration pool.

Special.p: If you have levels in the investigator class, you can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, you gain three extra uses of inspiration per day.

Bundle.title: Extra Investigator Talent
Bundle.description: You learn a new way to use your training and inspiration.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Investigator talent class feature.

Benefit.p: You gain one additional investigator talent. You must meet the prerequisites for this investigator talent.

Special.p: You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, you gain another investigator talent.

Bundle.title: Extra Item Slot
Bundle.description: You are able to wear magic items more easily than other creatures of your kind.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Non-humanoid body shape.

Benefit.p: Choose one magic item slot not normally available to creatures with your shape. You can now use magic items in that slot.

Special.p: Feats that are meant for familiars can be switched out for a familiar's default feats (as listed in the familiar's statistics) if the familiar meets the prerequisites. Such feat replacements must be made when the PC first acquires a new familiar, and-like all new feats from supplemental sources-the new feats should be approved by the GM before being integrated into play.

Bundle.title: Extra Ki
Bundle.description: You can use your ki pool more times per day than most.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Ki pool class feature.

Benefit.p: Your ki pool increases by 2.

Special.p: You can gain Extra Ki multiple times. Its effects stack.

Bundle.title: Extra Lay On Hands
Bundle.description: You can use your lay on hands ability more often.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Lay on hands class feature.

Benefit.p: You can use your lay on hands ability two additional times per day.

Special.p: You can gain Extra Lay On Hands multiple times. Its effects stack.

Bundle.title: Extra Martial Flexibility
Bundle.description: You are extremely versatile in a fight.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Martial flexibility class feature.

Benefit.p: You can use your martial flexibility ability three additional times per day.

Bundle.title: Extra Mental Focus
Bundle.description: You possess increased mental focus.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Mental focus class feature.

Benefit.p: You gain 2 additional points of mental focus.

Bundle.title: Extra Mercy
Bundle.description: Your lay on hands ability adds an additional mercy.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Lay on hands class feature, mercy class feature.

Benefit.p: Select one additional mercy for which you qualify. When you use lay on hands to heal damage to one target, it also receives the additional effects of this mercy.

Special.p: You can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time you take this feat, select a new mercy.

Bundle.title: Extra Mesmerist Tricks
Bundle.description: You can use your mesmerist tricks more often.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Mesmerist trick class feature.

Benefit.p: You can implant two additional mesmerist tricks per day.

Special.p: You can gain Extra Mesmerist Tricks multiple times. Its effects stack.

Bundle.title: Extra Mythic Power
Bundle.description: You can store more mythic power than your tier would normally allow.

Benefit.p: You gain two extra uses of mythic power each day.

Bundle.title: Extra Panache
Bundle.description: You have more panache than the ordinary swashbuckler.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Amateur Swashbuckler or panache class feature.

Benefit.p: You gain two more panache points at the start of each day, and your maximum panache increases by two.

Special.p: If you have levels in the swashbuckler class, you can take this feat multiple times. Its effects stack.

Bundle.title: Extra Path Ability
Bundle.description: You can call upon mythic powers beyond those already invested in you.
Bundle.Prerequisites: 3rd mythic tier.

Benefit.p: Choose one mythic ability from your path or from the universal path abilities that you meet the prerequisites for. You gain that path ability.

Bundle.title: Extra Performance
Bundle.description: You can use your bardic performance ability more often than normal.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Bardic performance class feature.

Benefit.p: You can use bardic performance for 6 additional rounds per day.

Special.p: You can gain Extra Performance multiple times. Its effects stack.

Bundle.title: Extra Rage
Bundle.description: You can use your rage ability more than normal.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Rage class feature.

Benefit.p: You can rage for 6 additional rounds per day.

Special.p: You can gain Extra Rage multiple times. Its effects stack.

Bundle.title: Extra Rage Power
Bundle.description: You have unlocked a new ability to use while raging.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Rage power class feature.

Benefit.p: You gain one additional rage power. You must meet all of the prerequisites for this rage power.

Special.p: You can gain Extra Rage Power multiple times.

Bundle.title: Extra Ranger Trap
Bundle.description: You can use ranger traps more often.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Trap class feature.

Benefit.p: You can set ranger traps two additional times per day.

Bundle.title: Extra Reservoir
Bundle.description: Your reservoir of arcane energy is greater than others'.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Arcane reservoir class feature.

Benefit.p: You gain three more points in your arcane reservoir, and the maximum number of points in your arcane reservoir increases by that amount.

Special.p: You can take this feat multiple times. Its effects stack.

Bundle.title: Extra Revelation
Bundle.description: You have discovered a new aspect of your mystery.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Revelation class feature.

Benefit.p: You gain one additional revelation. You must meet all of the prerequisites for this revelation.

Special.p: You can gain Extra Revelation multiple times.

Bundle.title: Extra Rogue Talent
Bundle.description: Through constant practice, you have learned how to perform a special trick.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Rogue talent class feature.

Benefit.p: You gain one additional rogue talent. You must meet all of the prerequisites for this rogue talent.

Special.p: You can gain Extra Rogue Talent multiple times.

Bundle.title: Extra Slayer Talent
Bundle.description: Through long practice, you have learned how to perform a special talent.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Slayer talent class feature.

Benefit.p: You gain one additional slayer talent. You must meet the prerequisites for this slayer talent.

Special.p: You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, you gain another slayer talent.

Bundle.title: Extra Summons
Bundle.description: You can summon monsters more often each day.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Ability to cast summon monster as a spell-like ability, summoner 1st.

Benefit.p: You gain 1 additional use of your summon monster spell-like ability per day.

Special.p: You can take this feat multiple times, but it can only be taken once for every five summoner levels you possess.

Bundle.title: Extra Touch Treatment
Bundle.description: You can use your touch treatment more often.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Touch treatment class feature.

Benefit.p: You can use touch treatment two additional times per day.

Bundle.title: Extra Variance
Bundle.description: You can augment your channeled energy in new ways.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Channeling Variance or variant channeling ability, channel energy class feature.

Benefit.p: You gain one additional variant channeling ability that matches one of your deity's domains, subdomains, or areas of concern. Three times per day, you can apply the modifications of this variant channel energy, reducing the damage dealt or healing performed by your channeled energy as normal. You cannot apply more than one variant channeling ability to your channeled energy at once.

Special.p: You can select this feat multiple times. Each time you do, you gain another variant channeling ability. If you have chosen Channeling Variance twice, you can use any variant channeling ability chosen with this feat whenever you channel energy.

Bundle.title: Extra Wild Talent
Bundle.description: You gain an additional wild talent.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Kineticist level 6th.

Benefit.p: You gain a wild talent that's at least 2 levels lower than the highest-level wild talent you can currently use. You can select an infusion or a non-infusion wild talent, but not a blast or defense wild talent. If you have the expanded element class feature, you can select a wild talent from any of your elements that's at least 2 levels lower than the highest-level wild talent from your primary element that you can currently use.

Special.p: You can take this feat multiple times. Each time, you must choose a different wild talent.

Bundle.title: Extraplanar Conjunction
Bundle.description: The innate planar energies of your allies empower your magical abilities, allowing you to make your spell-like abilities more difficult to resist.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Any racial spell-like ability, outsider.

Benefit.p: Whenever you're adjacent to an outsider ally who also has this feat, the DC of any racial spell-like abilities you use increases by 2 if your ally has the same racial spell-like ability. The proximity of multiple allies can't increase the DC further.

Bundle.title: Extreme Prejudice
Bundle.description: Your hatred of a particular type of creature has honed your killer instinct.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Seething Hatred, sneak attack +3d6, studied target class feature.

Benefit.p: When you succeed at a sneak attack against a creature you selected as the target of your Seething Hatred feat, you use d8s to roll sneak attack damage instead of d6s.

Bundle.title: Eye for Ingredients
Bundle.description: Your keen eyes help you find better deals on magical components for your spells.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Eschew Materials, Appraise 6 ranks, Spellcraft 6 ranks.

Benefit.p: When in a large city or larger settlement, you can search the markets carefully for 4 hours in order to purchase material components for your spells at a 10% discount. You can purchase up to 1,000 gp worth of material components (which costs you 900 gp) each day.
These cheaper components work perfectly well for their spells, but their resale value is also 10% less.

Bundle.title: Eyes of Judgment
Bundle.description: The true motives of creatures cannot escape your discerning gaze.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Detect alignment class feature, caster level 6th.

Benefit.p: When using your detect alignment class feature, you may spend 3 rounds studying a creature within 60 feet. You cannot take any other actions while doing this. After that time has passed, you learn the alignment of the creature.

Bundle.title: Eyes of the Twilight
Bundle.description: Your eyes have grown accustomed to the half-light of dusk and dawn.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Sharp Senses, Perception 7 ranks, keen senses racial trait, low-light vision.

Benefit.p: Creatures within an area of dim light don't gain concealment from you. You're still effectively blinded in an area of darkness.

Normal.p: Creatures within an area of dim light gain concealment (20% miss chance in combat) from those without darkvision or the ability to see in darkness.
